Title: PERIOD_DIFF()
Description:
Returns the number of months between periods
          P1 and
          P2. P1
          and P2 should be in the format
          YYMM or
          YYYYMM. Note that the period
          arguments P1 and
          P2 are not
          date values.

This function returns NULL if
          P1 or P2
          is NULL.

Press CTRL+C to copy mysql> SELECT PERIOD_DIFF(200802,200703);
        -> 11
